name: Ginger Tea for Nausea
description: Ginger tea is a natural remedy commonly used to relieve nausea and indigestion.
preparationMethod: Add grated ginger to hot water. Let it steep for 5–10 minutes. Strain and add honey if desired.
usageInstructions: Drink 1 cup up to 3 times a day, especially after meals or when experiencing nausea.
